title: PPS
extract: P.P.S. is defined as an additional comment or "postscript" which is added to a letter. An example of P.P.S. is when a girl adds "P.S.: I love you." and then adds "P.P.S.: I miss you." on the bottom of a letter. YourDictionary definition and usage example.
extract_html: P.P.S. is defined as an additional comment or "postscript" which is added to a letter. An example of P.P.S. is when a girl adds "P.S.: I love you." and then adds "P.P.S.: I miss you." on the bottom of a letter. YourDictionary definition and usage example.
